nodes.name: purchaseItem

addItemToInventory(bytes32,bytes32,uint2.details: Adds an Item to a Storefront inventory.

params._storeId: The storefront ID we want to update the inventory from.

constructor.details: Constructor. Sets msg.sender as the owner. Sets msg.sender as an administrator.

params._name: The name of the new storefront.

createStore(bytes32).return: id The ID of the new storefront.

getAdministrators().details: Get a list of all the administrators.
getAdministrators().return: admins The array of all the administrators address.

getOwnerStorefronts(address).details: Get a list of all the storefronts owned by a specific owner.
getOwnerStorefronts(address).return: (ids, names, balances) The arrays containing all the store IDs, names and balances.

getStoreOwners().details: Get a list of all the store owners.
getStoreOwners().return: owners The array of all the store owners address.

getStorefrontInventory(bytes32).details: Get the inventory for a specific Storefront.
getStorefrontInventory(bytes32).return: (itemIds, itemNames, itemQuantities, itemPrices) The Id, name, quantity and price for each Item.

getStorefronts().return: (ids, names, owners) The Id, name and owner for each Storefront.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

paused().return: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

purchaseItem(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).details: Allows a visitor to purchase an Item from a Storefront.

removeItemFromInventory(bytes32,bytes32).details: Removes an Item from a Storefront inventory.

params._itemId: The item ID we want to delete.
params._storeId: The storefront ID we want to update the inventory from.

removeStore(bytes32).details: Removes a storefront. Also deletes its inventory, items and transfers balance fund to the owner if needed.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

updateItemPrice(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).details: Updates the price of an Item from a specicic Storefront.

params._itemId: The item ID we want to update.
params._newPrice: The new price we want to set the Item to.
params._storeId: The storefront ID we want to update the inventory from.

updateItemQuantity(bytes32,bytes32,uint2.details: Updates the quantity of an Item from a specicic Storefront.

params._itemId: The item ID we want to update.
params._newQuantity: The new quantity value we want to set the Item to.
params._storeId: The storefront ID we want to update the inventory from.

widthdrawStorefrontBalance(bytes32).details: Transfers a storefront balance to its owner.
widthdrawStorefrontBalance(bytes32).return: true If balance was sent successfully.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
